title: English-Spanish Restaurant Vocabulary
description: Practice typical restaurant vocabulary: English word, Spanish translation, meaning, and choices.

questions.question: table
questions.meaning: A piece of furniture with a flat top and one or more legs, used for eating or working.

questions.question: waiter
questions.meaning: A person who serves food and drinks at a restaurant.

questions.question: menu
questions.meaning: A list of food and drinks available at a restaurant.

questions.question: bill
questions.meaning: A statement of money owed for food and drinks at a restaurant.

questions.question: glass
questions.meaning: A container used for drinking liquids.

questions.question: plate
questions.meaning: A flat dish used for serving food.

questions.question: fork
questions.meaning: A utensil with prongs used for eating food.

questions.question: knife
questions.meaning: A utensil with a sharp blade used for cutting food.

questions.question: spoon
questions.meaning: A utensil with a round bowl used for eating or serving food.

questions.question: napkin
questions.meaning: A piece of cloth or paper used to clean your mouth and hands while eating.

questions.question: chair
questions.meaning: A seat for one person, with a back, used at a table.

questions.question: reservation
questions.meaning: An arrangement to have a table saved for you at a restaurant.

questions.question: order
questions.meaning: A request for food or drinks at a restaurant.

questions.question: tip
questions.meaning: Extra money given to a waiter for good service.

questions.question: water
questions.meaning: A clear liquid that people drink.

questions.question: bread
questions.meaning: A food made from flour, water, and yeast, often served at restaurants.

questions.question: appetizer
questions.meaning: A small dish served before the main meal.

questions.question: main course
questions.meaning: The main dish of a meal.

questions.question: dessert
questions.meaning: Sweet food eaten at the end of a meal.

questions.question: beverage
questions.meaning: A drink, especially one other than water.

questions.question: wine
questions.meaning: An alcoholic drink made from grapes.

questions.question: beer
questions.meaning: An alcoholic drink made from barley and hops.

questions.question: juice
questions.meaning: A drink made from the liquid of fruits or vegetables.

questions.question: coffee
questions.meaning: A hot drink made from roasted coffee beans.

questions.question: tea
questions.meaning: A hot drink made by infusing dried leaves in boiling water.

questions.question: salt
questions.meaning: A white substance used to season food.

questions.question: pepper
questions.meaning: A spice used to add flavor to food.

questions.question: oil
questions.meaning: A liquid used in cooking and dressing salads.

questions.question: vinegar
questions.meaning: A sour liquid used in cooking and salads.

questions.question: soup
questions.meaning: A liquid dish made by boiling meat, vegetables, etc.

questions.question: salad
questions.meaning: A dish of mixed vegetables, usually served cold.

questions.question: meat
questions.meaning: Animal flesh eaten as food.

questions.question: chicken
questions.meaning: A type of bird eaten as food.

questions.question: fish
questions.meaning: An aquatic animal eaten as food.

questions.question: vegetable
questions.meaning: A plant or part of a plant used as food.

questions.question: rice
questions.meaning: A grain used as food, often served as a side dish.

questions.question: pasta
questions.meaning: A dish made from wheat flour and water, often served with sauce.

questions.question: egg
questions.meaning: A round object laid by birds, eaten as food.

questions.question: bitter
questions.meaning: Having a sharp, unpleasant taste.

questions.question: cheese
questions.meaning: A food made from milk, usually solid and yellow or white.

questions.question: milk
questions.meaning: A white liquid produced by cows, used as a drink or in cooking.

questions.question: yogurt
questions.meaning: A creamy food made from milk fermented by bacteria.

questions.question: fruit
questions.meaning: The sweet and fleshy product of a tree or plant, eaten as food.

questions.question: ice cream
questions.meaning: A sweet frozen food made from milk and sugar.

questions.question: waitress
questions.meaning: A woman who serves food and drinks at a restaurant.

questions.question: cook
questions.meaning: A person who prepares food in a restaurant.

questions.question: customer
questions.meaning: A person who buys food or drinks at a restaurant.

questions.question: cashier
questions.meaning: A person who takes payment at a restaurant.

questions.question: host
questions.meaning: A person who greets and seats guests at a restaurant.

questions.question: tip jar
questions.meaning: A container for collecting tips from customers.

questions.question: straw
questions.meaning: A thin tube used for drinking liquids.

questions.question: ice
questions.meaning: Frozen water used to cool drinks.

questions.question: sauce
questions.meaning: A liquid or semi-liquid substance served with food to add flavor.

questions.question: waitlist
questions.meaning: A list of people waiting for a table at a restaurant.

questions.question: special
questions.meaning: A dish offered at a reduced price or for a limited time.

questions.question: side dish
questions.meaning: A small dish served with the main course.

questions.question: grilled
questions.meaning: Cooked over direct heat on a grill.

questions.question: fried
questions.meaning: Cooked in hot oil.

questions.question: baked
questions.meaning: Cooked in an oven.

questions.question: boiled
questions.meaning: Cooked in boiling water.

questions.question: spicy
questions.meaning: Having a strong, hot flavor.

questions.question: sweet
questions.meaning: Having a sugary flavor.

questions.question: salty
questions.meaning: Tasting of salt.

questions.question: bitter
questions.meaning: Having a sharp, unpleasant taste.
